original_text: Jesus took the blind man's hand and he led the man out of the village. Jesus put water from his own mouth on the man's eyes. And he put his hands on the man. ‘Can you see anything?’ Jesus asked.
korean_text: 예수께서 맹인의 손을 붙잡으시고 마을 밖으로 데리고 나가사 눈에 침을 뱉으시며 그에게 안수하시고 무엇이 보이느냐 물으시니

sentences.original_text: Jesus took the blind man's hand
and he led the man out of the village
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람을 마을 밖으로 이끄셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus put water from his own mouth
And he put his hands on the man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분은 자신의 손을 그 사람에게 얹으셨습니다
